alert.note: Alert for Coastal Chatham (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 22 at 11:29PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...LOCALLY DENSE FOG FROM TYBEE ISLAND TO HILTON HEAD... Areas of fog are beginning to develop along the coast late this evening. Satellite, webcams and surface observations show locally dense fog has developed around the Tybee Island and Hilton Head areas with visibilities 1/4 mile or less. The fog could become more widespread overnight. The nature of the fog is such that visibilities will vary greatly over short distances. Motorists should be alert for rapidly changing conditions.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down and leave extra distance ahead of you in case a sudden stop is needed.
